info.name: Ungey SNyaan Status
info.description:
Removes extra geyness from socialneko.org
Specifically, the "friend" flag on status that takes up much too much space, and is visually distracting.
info.additionalInfo:
V 1.0 -
7.3.18
The admins will probably remove this atrocity of web design soon, rendering this fix obsolete, but my pain at the discordance of the visual flow cannot wait that long. This is not homophobic, just utilitarian.
